clawbackDescription: Transfer all funds from the targeted child DAO to the parent project
createProposalTemplateDescription: Please update this description to explain the purpose of your template.
createProposalTemplateDescriptionPrefix: > Execution of this proposal will create a new proposal template, attached to this project.
removeProposalTemplateDescription: Execution of this proposal will remove the proposal template attached to this project.
lidoWithdrawalDescription: This proposal will burn your Lido Withdrawal NFT and return the ETH to your treasury.
